resources.string: create table star_record ( _id Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number Integer not null, time DaLong not null, type Varchar, `desc` varchar )
create table star_task ( _id Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number Integer not null, createTime DaLong not null, modifyTime DaLong not null, type Varchar, `desc` varchar, `name` varchar )
select * from star_record order by time desc
select sum(number) from star_record where time >= %1$d and time < %2$d
